Description.Text: The Exhibition Court Hotel 4 is a brand new 3 star deluxe hotel, very close to Earls Court Station and the Exhibition Centre. The 20 guestrooms are bright and airy and include kitchenettes with microwaves, refrigerators and coffee and tea making facilities.Other modern amenities include Internet connections, satellite televisions, hair dryers and telephones, a 24-hour front desk, nearby parking, security cameras and an all-night porter. It is ideal for business travellers, families, tourists and individuals.The Hotel also provides non-smoking rooms, reception, restaurant and london tour bus tickets and trips musems london.
The Hotel is walking distance for 5 minutes By Road From the west - take the A4 to central London and turn left into Warwick Road.

Single Room - The Room offers a Twin bed with color TV, crockery/cutlery, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron/ironing board, kettle, kitchenette, microwave oven, non-smoking rooms, refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and toaster.
Double Room - The Room offers a Double or a Twin bed with with color TV, crockery/cutlery, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron/ironing board, kettle, kitchenette, microwave oven, non-smoking rooms, refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and toaster.
Triple Room - The Room offers a Double and a Twin bed with with color TV, crockery/cutlery, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron/ironing board, kettle, kitchenette, microwave oven, non-smoking rooms, refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and toaster.
